perturbation.original_text: Within seventy-five (75) days following the end of each month of a calendar year during the Term that "BCF" (as defined below) for such month, when combined with BCF for all prior months during such calendar year (other than any month which is outside the Term) is less than the Minimum BCF, Nexstar shall pay a fee to WYZZ in an amount equal to thirty-five percent (35%) of BCF for such month. Within seventy-five (75) days following the end of each month of a calendar year during the Term that BCF for such month, when combined with BCF for all prior months of such calendar year (other than any month which is outside the Term) is greater than the Minimum BCF, Nexstar shall pay a fee to WYZZ in an amount equal to 50% of BCF for such month; provided, in the first month of each calendar year in which this sentence applies, the fee with respect to the portion of BCF for such month which, when combined with BCF for all prior months during such year (other than any month which is outside the Term) is exactly equal to the Minimum BCF, shall equal thirty-five percent (35%) of such portion rather than fifty percent (50%).
perturbation.changed_text: Within seventy-five (75) days following the end of each month of a calendar year during the Term that "BCF" (as defined below) for such month, when combined with BCF for all prior months during such calendar year (other than any month which is outside the Term) is less than the Minimum BCF, Nexstar shall pay a fee to WYZZ in an amount equal to thirty-five percent (35%) of BCF for such month. Within forty-five (45) days following the end of each month of a calendar year during the Term that BCF for such month, when combined with BCF for all prior months of such calendar year (other than any month which is outside the Term) is greater than the Minimum BCF, Nexstar shall pay a fee to WYZZ in an amount equal to 50% of BCF for such month; provided, in the first month of each calendar year in which this sentence applies, the fee with respect to the portion of BCF for such month which, when combined with BCF for all prior months during such year (other than any month which is outside the Term) is exactly equal to thirty-five percent (35%) of such portion rather than fifty percent (50%).
perturbation.explanation: The change introduces an inconsistency by specifying different payment deadlines depending on whether the BCF is above or below the minimum. This creates confusion and potential disputes over which deadline applies in different scenarios, undermining the clarity and enforceability of the original payment terms.

perturbation.original_text: In addition to the payment of the Section 2(a) Amount, Nexstar agrees to pay WYZZ, within 30 days following each calendar month of the Term, the amount set forth on Exhibit B hereto with respect to such calendar month
perturbation.changed_text: In addition to the payment of the Section 2(a) Amount, Nexstar agrees to pay WYZZ, within 60 days following each calendar month of the Term, the amount set forth on Exhibit B hereto with respect to such calendar month
perturbation.explanation: The change introduces an inconsistency by changing the number of days to pay the amount on Exhibit B from 30 days to 60 days after each calendar month. Creates ambiguity regarding the payment deadline.

perturbation.original_text: Each Party shall make a payment to the other with respect to certain mutually agreed upon expenses and capital expenditures incurred (or to be incurred) as a result of the relationship created by this Agreement, such payments to be made promptly following the incurrence of any expenses and/or expenditures.
perturbation.changed_text: Each Party shall make a payment to the other with respect to certain mutually agreed upon expenses and capital expenditures incurred (or to be incurred) as a result of the relationship created by this Agreement, such payments to be made 90 days following the incurrence of any expenses and/or expenditures.
perturbation.explanation: The change replaces 'promptly' with '90 days', which directly conflicts and creates ambiguity about the actual payment timeline. There is no clear 'promptly' definition, and 90 days is explicit. However, it still causes a conflict.
